name: Ender of Fire
description:
After the Forest War, a local war waged on between the Beast tribes and the Human-Elf alliance.
The only way to truly end this accursed war is to defeat the Elders of the Beast tribes and the Ancient being known as The One.

Features:
- Side-Scrolling Fantasy Action Game
- 1~3 Players: local co-op
- 3 Heroes: Knight, Archer and Mage, each with their own skills
- 6 Battle Stages with 40 kinds of Monster

1-3 players
10MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output
